columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the evidence.

columns.name: assessment_id
columns.description: An unique identifier for the assessment.

columns.name: control_set_id
columns.description: The identifier for the control set.

columns.name: evidence_folder_id
columns.description: The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.

columns.name: assessment_report_selection
columns.description: Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.

columns.name: aws_account_id
columns.description: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

columns.name: aws_organization
columns.description: The AWS account from which the evidence is collected, and its AWS organization path.

columns.name: compliance_check
columns.description: The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance check category.

columns.name: data_source
columns.description: The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.

columns.name: event_name
columns.description: The name of the specified evidence event.

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The AWS service from which the evidence is collected.

columns.name: evidence_aws_account_id
columns.description: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

columns.name: iam_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the evidence.

columns.name: time
columns.description: The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: The names and values used by the evidence event

columns.name: resources_included
columns.description: The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.
